ouija.question: Where are you?
ouija.response: Name of the room that the ghost is currently in

ouija.question: Are you here?
ouija.response: Whether the ghost is in the same room as the Ouija board and player

ouija.question: Where is the bone?
ouija.response: Name of the room where the bone is located
notes: A bug may cause this question not to work

ouija.question: (Do you want to play) hide and seek?
ouija.response: Board counts down from 5; at 0, a cursed hunt begins

ouija.question: How many people/ghosts are in this room? Are we alone?
ouija.response: A number is given, though how it is calculated is unknown
notes: Response is at least partially a function of the number of people in the room

ouija.question: Do you respond to everyone?
notes: Basically says whether the Spirit Box needs to be used by a single person alone

ouija.question: How old are you? What is your age?
ouija.response: A number from 2—90 (or so – not verified)

ouija.question: How long have you been dead?
Why are you here? What do you want?
Knock, knock
notes: Other jokes can be made – see references
